thread.section_title: Guardian Self Storage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Guardian Self Storage | guardianselfstorage.com
thread.title: Mrs. Ricci
thread.title_full: Guardian Self Storage reviewed by Mrs. Ricci

author: Mrs. Ricci
title: Mrs. Ricci
text:
We are extremely happy we chose them.
#1 Excellent Customer Service!!!
My husband and I went searching for a storage bin in the area. We were looking for a affordable, safe, clean, and easy access place.
We met face to face with a woman in the office, she took the time to walk us through everything about the storage process, she showed us the different size storage units, the secure-security access, the promotional discounts, and she even took the time to show us the affordable secure locks for the storage unit.
What we loved about the storage unit, was that the units are like having a garage, you drive right up to it.
It's under 24 hour security.
The excellent customer service.
If you choose Guardian Self Storage, you'll be very happy you did.
Thank you Judy, good businesses like yours are hard to come by.
- Mrs. Ricci
